title: Flipped and combined Lolipoppy Splash
body: I flipped and combined the old Lolipoppy Splash because I was inspired by DorkyChans Tryndamere (https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/45E78wEE-soooo-i-flipped-tryndameres-old-splash-art-and-combined-it). The result was actually pretty terrifyng. https://i.imgur.com/R9tMZox.jpg https://i.imgur.com/5H8d5fN.jpg
